text: geubun-eun cheonjileul changjohasigo haneullobuteo bileul naelyeojusin bun-isi myeo i biloseo jeong-won-eul aleumdabgo mu seonghage hamyeo geu an-e namuleul jala ge haneun geos-eun neohuiga anila hana nim oee daleun sin-i iss-eul su issneu nyo geuleona geudeul-eun beos-eonan baegseongdeul ila
